name: Prundar
aura: Increase Ally  in Doom Tower battles by 30

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

Has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn instead when counterattacking with this skill.
